title: Super High Ping!
body: Simple as the heading why is the ping so high right now? My internet connection is fine just league server seems a bit screwed....

replies.body: I just lost a ranked game cos of this... 20k ping . I try to reconnect to the game but I was unable. Ofc me and my friend lost the game and elo. It was my friend promotion game... Later he tried to play another 1 he lost that as well cos of this same problem. At least lost forgiven or just like nothing happen maybe RIOT ? This is unacceptable ! Not our faul we lost the game ! Close the ranked games or something when u have maintinance or problems or just dont made loss forgiven the games.
